  • Changelog

    Function reference

    Fitting penalized linear mixed models (PLMMs - the featured presentation)

    choose_k()
    a function to choose k, the number of eigenvalues to use in truncated SVD
    plmm()
    Fit a linear mixed model with non-convex regularization

    Inference for PLMMs

    mfdr()
    mfdr: Marginal false discovery rates for PLMMs

    Loss, information, and cross-validation for PLMMs

    cv.plmm()
    Cross-validation for plmm
    gic()
    General information criterion method of selecting lambda for "plmm" class
    loss.plmm()
    Loss method for "plmm" class
    log_lik()
    Evaluate the negative log-likelihood of an intercept-only Gaussian plmm model
    residuals(<plmm>)
    Extract residuals from a PLMM fit

    Coefficient methods for LMMs and PLMMs

    coef(<cv.plmm>)
    Coef method for "cv.plmm" class
    coef(<plmm>)
    Coef method for "plmm" class

    Inference for PLMMs

    mfdr()
    mfdr: Marginal false discovery rates for PLMMs

    Other model fitting methods (and some helper functions)

    convexMin()
    Calculate index for which objective function ceases to be locally convex
    residuals(<plmm>)
    Extract residuals from a PLMM fit
    v_hat()
    a function to create the estimated variance matrix from a PLMM fit

    Data (pre)processing and wrangling

    get_data()
    Read in processed data This function is intended to be called after process_plink() has been called once.
    plink_example()
    A function to help with accessing example PLINK files
    process_plink()
    Preprocess PLINK files using the bigsnpr package
    relatedness_mat()
    Calculate a relatedness matrix

    Plotting, summarizing, and formatting

    summary(<plmm>)
    A summary method for the plmm objects
    print(<summary.plmm>)
    A function to print the summary of a plmm model
    summary(<cv.plmm>)
    A summary function for cv.plmm objects
    print(<summary.cv.plmm>)
    Print method for summary.cv.plmm objects
    plot(<cv.plmm>)
    Plot method for cv.plmm class
    plot(<plmm>)
    Plot method for plmm class
    mfdr_plot()
    Plot method for mFDR

    Prediction

    predict(<plmm>)
    Predict method for plmm class

    Data sets

    admix
    Admix: Semi-simulated SNP data
    pedigree
    Pedigree: mock genotype data from a family-based design.

    On this page
